content:
What do you consider the correct presentation to be? Table view instead of cards? Click on the icon that looks like a film roll at top right and see your options. Something else?

There are many layout options. I don't see a reason to think that your profile is bad.

content:
Try looking in C:\Users\username\AppData\Local\Packages for the profile . The full path is rather long, I believe. You can uninstall by clicking to the windows app component in the uninstall menu. This link has info on moving profiles: 

 https://kb.mozillazine.org/Moving_your_profile_folder_-_Thunderbird
creator: davidsk

content: Perhaps I should install the add-ons before restoring a profile, instead of after.
